<?php
if (!defined('ABSPATH')) { exit; }

// Elementor Editor ke andar JS inject karo
function elementor_editor_force_close() {
    echo '<script>
        // Editor ready hone ka wait
        var checkInterval = setInterval(function() {
            // Elementor global object check
            if (window.elementor !== undefined) {

                // Ab popup close logic run karo
                var closeInterval = setInterval(function() {
                    var btn = document.querySelector("#e-announcements-root .close-button");
                    if (btn) {
                        btn.click();
                    }
                }, 300);

                clearInterval(checkInterval);
            }
        }, 200);
    </script>';
}
add_action('elementor/editor/footer', 'elementor_editor_force_close');
